ygData.subject: Re: VAMPIRIC EMBRACE
ygData.msgSnippet: You can use a weapon now.  http://members.door.net/enigma ... From:	Shadow Panther [SMTP:shdwpanther@pitton.com] Sent:	Monday, May 17, 1999 5:55
ygData.messageBody:
You can use a weapon now.

<-- Enigma -->
http://members.door.net/enigma



-----Original Message-----
From: Shadow Panther [SMTP:shdwpanther@...]
Sent: Monday, May 17, 1999 5:55 PM
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] VAMPIRIC EMBRACE

From: "Shadow Panther" <shdwpanther@...>


Yeah the spell has a duration, a very short duration. You're not likely
to get very many life-taps out of it, unless you have something like a
dagger with a very fast attack rate. But even then, you have to go hand to
hand, and we're casters. I don't personally find a great use for it,
although other Necros have.

~Mysk

> From: "Mata" <mata_eq@...>
>
> Sweet! So the spell has a duration and you cast it and them melee??? and
it
> can happen more than once?? That is great!
